entry.title: Octopress的插件
entry.content:
记得去掉{和%之间的空格

包含代码（Include Code）

语法

{% codeblock %} { % include_code [title] [lang:language] path/to/file % } {% endcodeblock %}

例子

{% codeblock %} { % include_code test.js % } {% endcodeblock %}

{% include_code test.js %}

引用块（Blockquote）

语法
{ % blockquote [author[, source]] [link] [source_link_title] % }
Quote string
{ % endblockquote % }
例子
{ % blockquote % }
Last night I lay in bed looking up at the stars in the sky and I thought to myself, where the heck is the ceiling.
{ % endblockquote % }

{% blockquote %} Last night I lay in bed looking up at the stars in the sky and I thought to myself, where the heck is the ceiling. {% endblockquote %}

{ % blockquote Douglas Adams, The Hichhikers Guide to the Galaxy % }
Flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss.
{ % endblockquote % }

{% blockquote Douglas Adams, The Hichhikers Guide to the Galaxy %} Flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss. {% endblockquote %}

{ % blockquote Seth Godin http://sethgodin.typepad.com/seths_blog/2009/07/welcome-to-island-marketing.html Welcome to Island Marketing % }
Every interaction is both precious and an opportunity to delight.
{ % endblockquote % }

{% blockquote Seth Godin http://sethgodin.typepad.com/seths_blog/2009/07/welcome-to-island-marketing.html Welcome to Island Marketing %} Every interaction is both precious and an opportunity to delight. {% endblockquote %}

entry.title: 在octopress里写博客
entry.content:
代码高亮

Codeblock

语法

```

{ % codeblock [title] [lang:language] [url] [link text] % }
code snippet
{ % endcodeblock % }

```

例子
{ % codeblock % }
Awesome code snippet
{ % endcodeblock % }

{% codeblock %}

Awesome code snippet
{% endcodeblock %}

Backtick Code Blocks

语法
``` [language] [title] [url] [link text]
code snippet
```
例子
```
$ sudo make me a sandwich
```

$ sudo make me a sandwich

摘要

如果不希望显示全文，只需要在你希望首页显示的内容最后，输入： {% codeblock %}

{% endcodeblock %}

插入图片

语法

{ % img [class names] /path/to/image [width] [height] [title text [alt text]] % }

例子

{ % img center /images/zy.jpg 300 300 品 % }
{ % img center /images/zd.jpg 300 300 丹丹 % }

{% img center /images/zy.jpg 300 300 品 %} {% img center /images/zd.jpg 300 300 朱朱 %}

插入视频

语法

{ % video url/to/video [width height] [url/to/poster] % }

例子

{ % video http://s3.imathis.com/video/zero-to-fancy-buttons.mp4 640 320 http://s3.imathis.com/video/zero-to-fancy-buttons.png % }

{% video http://s3.imathis.com/video/zero-to-fancy-buttons.mp4 640 320 http://s3.imathis.com/video/zero-to-fancy-buttons.png %}

entry.title: how-to-install-octopress
entry.content:
系统是Mac OS X Lion 10.7.5

Step1 安装homebrew

ruby -e "$(curl -fsSkL raw.github.com/mxcl/homebrew/go)"
brew update

Failed during: git reset --hard origin/master

解决办法：sudo chown -R ${USER} /usr/local/Library

如果已经安装了Macports，先卸载掉

sudo rm -rf \  
/opt/local \  
/Applications/DarwinPorts \  
/Applications/MacPorts \  
/Library/LaunchDaemons/org.macports.* \  
/Library/Receipts/DarwinPorts*.pkg \  
/Library/Receipts/MacPorts*.pkg \  
/Library/StartupItems/DarwinPortsStartup \  
/Library/Tcl/darwinports1.0 \  
/Library/Tcl/macports1.0 \  
~/.macports

Step2 安装RVM

bash -s stable < <(curl -s https://raw.github.com/wayneeseguin/rvm/master/binscripts/rvm-installer)
source ~/.bashrc

Step3 安装Ruby

rvm install 1.9.3
rvm use 1.9.3 --default

Step4 安装Octopress

git clone git://github.com/imathis/octopress.git octopress  
gem install bundler  
bundle install
rake install

Step5 在github中托管

到目前我止，我们的blog仅能在本机中访问，如何将其托管到github中呢？如何使用我们自己的域名呢？让一切看起来就如同我们自己的站点。

如果你要使用自己的域名，github需要一个CNAME文件，进入source文件夹，新建CNAME文件。

$ ch source
$ touch CNAME

托管到github中

$ rake setup_github_pages

系统提示你输入一个形如:git@github.com:username/username.github.com.git,username是你在github.com中注册的用户名，username.github.com.git是你自己在github.com中创建的代码库。输入后按回车确定.

向github提交

$ rake generate
$ rake deploy

大概的步骤就是这么多，遇见别的问题去请教google大神吧
